article: Mr Black works in a hospital . As a good  _  , the people in the town like him. He's often  _  to the patients and looks them over carefully.  _  he's always busy and has little time to rest. One morning Mr Black got to the hospital and saw there was a fat woman in the  waiting room  . He called her into his office and asked, "  What's the matter  , madam ?" "It was my birthday yesterday, sir", said the woman. "My husband gave me a  _  . But I couldn't push my way in it." "  It doesn't matter  , madam," said Mr Black, "You must lose some weight . You'll be able to  _  your coat, if you do all that I say." "You're  _  , sir," said the rich woman. "He bought me not a coat, but an expensive  _  ."
